author: Press
title: Acid Kings Tickets CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Acid Kings Tickets for their 2015
text:
(MENAFN Press) concert tickets for their 2015 tour dates are on sale now for cities like San Diego Brooklyn and Raleigh. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Acid Kings fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Acid Kings tickets at affordable prices. Acid Kings are hitting the road in 2015 and kicking it all off on October 16th in San Diego CA.
The stoner metal band will be out in support of their new album Middle Of Nowhere Center Of Everywhere.
to browse all levels of seating for Acid King concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
There isn't an event you will see this year that has the same exciting atmosphere as a live Acid King concert.
CapitalCityTickets.com already offers slashed ticket prices on all their ticket inventory. You can save an additional percentage off by using promo code provided.
Follow on Social Media for Special Deals and Discounts
